Key Match Events: Aaron Jones scored an unbeaten 94 off just 40 balls, leading the USA to victory.
Andries Gous supported Jones with a well-played 65 off 46 balls.
The USA won by seven wickets, chasing down the target set by Canada.
Canada's Dhaliwal scored 61 runs in their innings.
Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Patel praised the team's fearless cricket and highlighted the performances of Gous and Jones.
Canada skipper Saad Bin Zafar acknowledged the good start by Dhaliwal and Kirton but noted the bowlers' inability to contain Jones and Gous.
Aaron Jones expressed his happiness in getting the team over the line and mentioned that pressure brings the best out of him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the opening game of the ICC T20 World Cup 2024.
The USA's victory was marked by significant contributions from their key players.
